page.title: 14What My Gran Said
page.content:
I asked my Gran what she thought of Camberley. My comments are in blue.
A long time ago there used to be many houses in Camberley.{It was tiny} Now-a-days it is all factories and office blocks with only a few houses. {There are 8 times more houses than {when Gran moved here.}The Frimley Road used to be a cart track{it's now a {major bus route}and behind it used to to be a big common. Now there are about twenty-four factories with a small field behind them.{True} I remember an old-fashioned sweet shop, but with all the modernisation that has taken place, it has been re-placed by a take-away fish-and-chip shop.{ We have 3 new sweet shops now Also where there used to be houses there is now an office block.{People {have to work somewhere. }
